publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3878 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2003â€”That the Local Government Committee recommends that the draft Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2003 be approved.Supported by: Peter Peacock*
